metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17362 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In LibTomCrypt through 1.18.2, the der_decode_utf8_string function (in der_decode_utf8_string.c) does not properly detect certain invalid UTF-8 sequences. This allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read and crash) or read information from other memory locations via carefully crafted DER-encoded data. It was discovered that LibTomCrypt incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or read sensitive information.

criterions.comment: libtomcrypt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
